name: Weightless Sonnet
description:
Shock recieves news that the world needs resetting - he must set out to find 3 others with powers like him so that they can help the world reset to a stable condition before time runs out. Canon in the NAPCAST universe.

TRIGGER WARNINGS:

This game contains themes of;

  • Drawn Fire
  • Dereality
  • Missing People
  • Death
  • Flashing Lights
